description: To create the MMPZ file, click the save icon in the top-left of the application or select Project → Save or Save As... , name your project, choose the save location, and click Save .
To open the MMPZ file, you can simply double-click the file. You can also open the project inside of the application, select Project → Open... , navigate to your file, select it, and click Open .
NOTE: LMMS replaced the .MMP file extension with the MMPZ extension.
